commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Thank you, everyone!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Business is booming, Emma!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Oh hey! You came!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I wanted to see how you were doing. You were amazing, the way you handled that long line that went all the way outside.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: What?! Were you watching me the whole time? You should've come up to say hello.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I didn't want to bother you. Are you getting the hang of it now?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah, little by little. It's busy, but I'm enjoying it. I looove being surrounded by beautiful kimono!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: And it's fun to talk to the customers! I feel like I'm meeting a kindred spirit when someone shows an interest in kimono. It makes me so happy.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's great. You look better than ever in your kimono, too.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Giggle* Thanks!

commands.select_args: ||Hopefully you can learn kimono dressing yourself.|| select_2

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You really do look beautiful in a kimono, Emma.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: D-Don't stare so much! I'm embarrassed!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hopefully you can learn kimono dressing yourself someday.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: For sure! Once I do, I'll dress you in one too.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: By the way, I heard from one of the staff here that the owner's daughter is a school idol too!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Whaaat?! Really?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. That must've been why they knew so much about school idols.
I'm home!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Huh...?
Oh! You must be Emma! My mom told me that you were gonna help out at the studio.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yes...?

commands.speaker: Mai
commands.line: Oops, sorry, my bad. My name is Mai. I'm the future owner of Natsukawa Photography Studio!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Um, pleased to meet you! I'm Emma, and I'll be helping out around the studio!

commands.speaker: Mai
commands.line: *Chuckle* Loosen up. I'm in the same grade as you, Emma. I'm also a school idol, just like you!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: My friend here just told me that. She's the club president of the School Idol Club that I belong to...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Nice to meet you.

commands.speaker: Mai
commands.line: Right back atcha!

commands.speaker: Mai
commands.line: Huh? You wanna see me perform?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yes please!

commands.speaker: Mai
commands.line: Well, I have a video on my phone... Here you go!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Wait...

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: This... This song...!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What is it, Emma?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I-I... I LOVE this song! I listened to it a lot when I lived in Switzerland, and it made me want to become a school idol!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I always wanted to meet the person who sang it! But...is this a cover of it? The girl I saw singing it was...

commands.speaker: Mai
commands.line: ...A Japanese-style beauty with long hair?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I'm not sure what you mean by Japanese-style, but...she did have long, flowy black hair.

commands.speaker: Mai
commands.line: I was given that song by an older school idol. Actually, the video you saw might've been one of our alumnae from a few years ago.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I had no idea.

commands.speaker: Mai
commands.line: Yeah. It's a shame that I won't be able to sing that song for much longer.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Huh? You won't be able to sing it? What do you mean?

commands.speaker: Mai
commands.line: I'm gonna quit being a school idol soon.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: What?!

commands.speaker: Mai
commands.line: Ooh, I guess my mom didn't fill you in on that part.
